items.name: support
items.title: Cossistant Support Widget
items.description: Open source, developer-first support widget for your SaaS.
items.docs: To get your NEXT_PUBLIC_COSSISTANT_API_KEY, sign up at https://cossistant.com and find your public API key in the settings page. Then wrap your app with <CossistantProvider> from the provider.tsx file. Our documentation is available at https://cossistant.com/docs.
